name: Repair Remake Prototype
description:
original Re-pair: https://riks.itch.io/repair

Use A and D to move right, or use the left joystick on a controller!

Space to jump, or South Button on a controller!

Left Click on mouse, our West Button on controller to attack!

Press Esc to Quit the game!

A Prototype for what I would want a repair 2 to be. I was going to make this my year long project for 2021, but am apart of a group project that will take most of my time. So repair remake is shelved for now. I hope to come back to it some day. :) Let me know what you think. :)
